Team 75 - RoboRaiders

Privacy Policy

  • When you sign in to this app, we collect your name and email from your google account.
  • When logging in, we ensure that you are an authorized user approved by and whitelisted by Team 75's mentors. If you are not, your login attempt will be blocked. Please contact debnathe@htps.us to get your email approved.
  • After a successful login, you are assigned a session that automatically expires after 1.5 hours.
    • Please note that we store a session identifier locally on your computer. This is essential to website functionality to prevent unauthorized individuals from gaining access to this website's functionality.
